name: Fantasy Utopia
description:
...Far Far away, there lived a girl who dreamed of Adventure!

Fantasy Utopia, is just that, a fantastical utopian land, which our fearless hero protagonist has wanted nothing more then to  explore, brave grave peril and find hidden treasures!

The Inspiration: All artwork was designed by Antonia Blakeman @antonianimations. Sketching real buildings she'd seen on her own travels. The game was initially inspired by the Swiss mountains, where the houses are made from dark brown wood, decorated with bright red flowers outside the windows. So cartoonish and too beautiful not to draw, this became a huge inspiration. Considering the Swiss flag looks like five pixels arranged together, creating pixel art happened naturally. It's a tribute to a truly beautiful country, which still has an authentic feel and a culture that seems so delicate that one wonders if it will still remain, and thus must be recorded and preserved. From that, the game has developed beyond the high mountains, and into fantastical lands, where dreams and reality become blurred. For are they not but one and the same?
